title: Sister O'dell, Earl Graves Sr., Black Folks COVID-19 Talk, Junior Dating and more.
itunes:title: Sister O'dell, Earl Graves Sr., Black Folks COVID-19 Talk, Junior Dating and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This is The Steve Harvey Morning Show. It's the #1 show that you know. Sister O'dell has her opinion of this COVID-19 and tells us what she will do as soon as this pandemic passes, plus more. Black Enterprise founder Earl Graves Sr. dies at 85. Plus, Pastor Joel Olsteen will have a virtual Easter Service that will include Kanye West, Mariah Carey and Tyler Perry. COVID-19 Talk for today focuses on its effect on the Black Community. The CLO helps a man deal with distrust and abortion. It is said that people are improving themselves during this quarantine and the crew talks about what they will be better at once this COVID-19 ends. Your favorite play cousin Junior lets us in on his dating life. Today in Closing Remarks the crew talk about the first thing that they will do once this quarantine ends and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
